map.title: Wissenskarte
map.subtitle: Ein vollständiger Überblick über alle Kategorien, Unterkategorien und Themen

banner.title: Cookie-Einstellungen
banner.description: Wir verwenden Cookies, um Ihre Erfahrung zu verbessern, den Website-Verkehr zu analysieren und Inhalte zu personalisieren. Sie können Ihre Einstellungen jederzeit verwalten.
banner.closeWarning: Das Schließen ohne Auswahl wird alle nicht erforderlichen Cookies ablehnen.

settings.title: Cookie-Präferenzen
settings.description: Wählen Sie aus, welche Cookies Sie zulassen möchten. Sie können diese Einstellungen jederzeit über den Link in der Fußzeile ändern.
settings.closeWarning: Das Schließen ohne Speichern wird als Ablehnung aller nicht essentiellen Cookies behandelt.

necessary.name: Notwendige Cookies
necessary.description: Diese Cookies sind für das ordnungsgemäße Funktionieren der Website unerlässlich. Sie ermöglichen grundlegende Funktionen wie Seitennavigation und Zugriff auf sichere Bereiche. Die Website kann ohne diese Cookies nicht ordnungsgemäß funktionieren.

functional.name: Funktionale Cookies
functional.description: Diese Cookies speichern Ihre Präferenzen und Einstellungen, wie z.B. Sprachwahl und Theme, um Ihnen eine personalisiertere Erfahrung zu bieten.

analytics.name: Analyse-Cookies
analytics.description: Diese Cookies helfen uns zu verstehen, wie Besucher unsere Website nutzen, indem sie anonyme Informationen sammeln und melden. Dies hilft uns, die Leistung und Benutzererfahrung der Website zu verbessern.

marketing.name: Marketing-Cookies
marketing.description: Diese Cookies werden verwendet, um Besucher über Websites hinweg zu verfolgen und personalisierte Werbung anzuzeigen. Sie helfen uns, die Wirksamkeit unserer Marketingkampagnen zu messen.

notFound.title: Seite nicht gefunden
notFound.description: Diese Seite konnte nicht gefunden werden.

meta.title: Terms of Service
meta.description: Terms of Service for using Oxyness - a platform for spiritual and esoteric content. Read our terms, disclaimers, and legal information.

hero.title: Terms of Service
hero.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using Oxyness

introduction.title: 1. Introduction & Acceptance of Terms
introduction.welcome: Welcome to Oxyness. These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your access to and use of the Oxyness website, services, and content (collectively, the "Services").
introduction.acceptance: By accessing or using our Services, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use our Services.
introduction.important: IMPORTANT: These Terms contain disclaimers of warranties and limitations of liability. By using Oxyness, you acknowledge that you have read and understood these Terms.

definitions.title: 2. Definitions
definitions.intro: For the purposes of these Terms, the following definitions apply:

terms.definition: Refers to the Oxyness platform and its operators
The Oxyness website, content aggregation platform, directory listings, and all related features and functionalities
Any person who accesses or uses our Services
All text, images, data, information, software, and other materials available through our Services
External websites, platforms, or services that we link to or reference
Spiritual practitioners, healers, or service providers listed in our directory

educational.title: 3. Educational Purpose Disclaimer
educational.purpose: All content and services provided by Oxyness are for educational and informational purposes only. Our platform aggregates and presents information about spiritual, esoteric, and metaphysical topics and practitioners.
educational.notAdvice: The information provided through our Services does not constitute professional medical, psychological, legal, financial, or any other form of professional advice. We do not diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any physical or mental condition.
educational.responsibility: You are solely responsible for your own decisions and actions. Always consult with qualified professionals before making decisions related to your health, finances, legal matters, or other important life choices.

noProfessionalRelationship.title: 4. No Professional Relationship
noProfessionalRelationship.content: Use of our Services does not create any professional-client relationship between you and Oxyness. We are a content aggregation and directory platform only.
noProfessionalRelationship.advisors: Advisors and practitioners listed on Oxyness are independent third parties. They are not our employees, agents, or representatives. We do not employ, endorse, or verify them.

thirdParty.title: 5. Third-Party Content & Advisor Disclaimer
thirdParty.intro: Oxyness aggregates content and listings from third-party sources. Regarding this content:
disclaimers: We do not endorse, guarantee, or verify the accuracy, quality, or reliability of third-party content or services
We are not responsible for the actions, services, or practices of any advisors or practitioners listed on our platform
We do not guarantee any outcomes or results from using services of listed advisors
Interactions with advisors are entirely at your own risk
We are not liable for any disputes, damages, or issues arising from your interactions with third parties
Users should independently verify information and conduct their own due diligence before engaging with any advisor or service

externalLinks.title: 6. External Links
externalLinks.content: Our Services contain links to external websites and platforms operated by third parties. These links are provided for your convenience and reference only.
externalLinks.responsibility: We are not responsible for the content, privacy practices, terms of service, or any other aspect of external websites. We do not endorse or make any representations about third-party sites. Your use of external sites is at your own risk and subject to their terms and policies.

intellectualProperty.title: 7. Intellectual Property Rights
intellectualProperty.ownership: Oxyness owns or has the right to use all intellectual property rights in our Services, including but not limited to the website design, compilation of content, original text, graphics, logos, and software. These materials are protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

permitted.title: Permitted Uses
items: View and access our Services for personal, non-commercial purposes
Share links to our content through social media or other platforms
Print or download individual pages for personal reference

prohibited.title: Prohibited Uses
items: Copy, reproduce, republish, or redistribute our content without permission
Use automated tools (bots, scrapers) to extract data from our Services
Create derivative works based on our content or Services
Remove or modify copyright notices, trademarks, or other proprietary markings
Use our content for commercial purposes without written authorization

userResponsibilities.title: 8. User Responsibilities & Acceptable Use
userResponsibilities.intro: When using our Services, you agree to:
rules: Use the Services only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms
Be at least 18 years of age, or have parental/guardian consent if under 18
Provide accurate information if you create an account or contact us
Respect the intellectual property rights of Oxyness and third parties
Not engage in any activity that could harm, disable, overburden, or impair our Services
Not attempt to gain unauthorized access to any part of our Services
Not engage in harassment, hate speech, or other harmful behavior
Not use our Services to spread malware, viruses, or other harmful code
Not impersonate any person or entity or misrepresent your affiliation

contentAccuracy.title: 9. Content Accuracy & Changes
contentAccuracy.noGuarantee: While we strive to provide accurate and up-to-date information, we make no warranties or guarantees about the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of our Content. Information on our platform may become outdated, incomplete, or inaccurate.
contentAccuracy.changes: We reserve the right to update, modify, or remove any Content at any time without notice. We are not obligated to update information or notify users of changes.

privacy.title: 10. Privacy & GDPR Compliance
privacy.content: Your privacy is important to us. Our collection, use, and protection of your personal data is governed by our Privacy Policy, which complies with the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

liability.title: 11. Limitation of Liability
liability.warning: ⚠️ IMPORTANT: PLEASE READ THIS SECTION CAREFULLY
liability.noLiability: TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, OXYNESS AND ITS OPERATORS, AFFILIATES, AND SERVICE PROVIDERS SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES, OR ANY LOSS OF PROFITS, REVENUE, DATA, OR USE, ARISING OUT OF OR RELATED TO YOUR USE OF OUR SERVICES, WHETHER BASED ON WARRANTY, CONTRACT, TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE), OR ANY OTHER LEGAL THEORY, EVEN IF WE HAVE BEEN ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES.
liability.asIs: OUR SERVICES ARE PROVIDED "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" WITHOUT ANY WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, OR NON-INFRINGEMENT.

indemnification.title: 12. Indemnification
indemnification.content: You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless Oxyness and its operators, affiliates, partners, and service providers from any claims, liabilities, damages, losses, costs, or expenses (including reasonable attorneys' fees) arising out of or related to: (a) your use of our Services; (b) your violation of these Terms; (c) your violation of any rights of third parties; or (d) your interactions with advisors or third parties found through our Services.

termination.title: 13. Termination
termination.rights: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to our Services at any time, with or without cause, and with or without notice, if we believe you have violated these Terms or for any other reason.
termination.effect: Upon termination, your right to use our Services will immediately cease. Sections of these Terms that by their nature should survive termination will survive, including but not limited to intellectual property provisions, disclaimers, limitations of liability, and indemnification.

governingLaw.title: 14. Governing Law & Dispute Resolution
governingLaw.law: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Hungary and the European Union, without regard to conflict of law provisions.
governingLaw.disputes: Any disputes arising out of or related to these Terms or our Services shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Hungary. For EU consumers, you may also have the right to use the EU Online Dispute Resolution platform at https://ec.europa.eu/consumers/odr.

multilingual.title: 15. Multilingual Terms
multilingual.content: These Terms are provided in multiple languages for your convenience. In the event of any conflict or inconsistency between different language versions, the English version shall prevail and govern.

changes.title: 16. Changes to These Terms
changes.rights: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. When we make changes, we will update the "Last Updated" date at the top of this page.
changes.notification: Your continued use of our Services after any changes constitutes your acceptance of the revised Terms. We encourage you to review these Terms periodically.

severability.title: 17. Severability
severability.content: If any provision of these Terms is found to be invalid, illegal, or unenforceable, the remaining provisions shall continue in full force and effect. The invalid provision shall be modified to the minimum extent necessary to make it valid and enforceable.

contact.title: 18. Contact Information
contact.intro: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding these Terms of Service, please contact us:
